1583305200.descr: Bloomberg Markets: European Open. Live from London, is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

1583330400.title: Bloomberg Markets: The Open
1583330400.descr: Jonathan Ferro hosts this programme showcasing the most insightful and informative Bloomberg charts to help position a global audience for the trading day.

1583337600.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Close
1583337600.descr: Bloomberg Markets: European Close. Live from New York and London, analyzing the major market moving stories across the day in Europe, hear from the biggest newsmakers and showcase the unrivaled expertise of Bloomberg News.

1583341200.title: Bloomberg Markets: Balance of Power
1583341200.descr: Bloomberg Markets: Balance of Power focuses on the politics and policies being shaped by the agenda of President Trump's administration.

1583344800.title: Bloomberg ETF IQ
1583344800.descr: Bloomberg ETF IQ is the first and only show solely focusing on the opportunities, risks, and current events in the Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs) industry, which now represent 30% of all U.S. equity trading. Bloomberg's Scarlet Fu and Eric Balchunas are joined by leaders in this market, providing critical intelligence to financial advisers and investors of ETFs.

1583346600.title: Bloomberg Markets: Americas
1583346600.descr: Bloomberg Markets: Americas. Live from New York, is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

1583348400.title: Bloomberg Markets: The Close
1583348400.descr: This fast-paced programme is the quintessential market close show leading up to the final minutes and seconds before the closing bell on Wall Street with the latest news, data and expert analysis.

1583355600.title: What'd You Miss?
1583355600.descr: Bloomberg TV's flagship markets program, providing key insights, analysis and context at the market close. It's a counterintuitive, highly intelligent look at the markets that misses absolutely nothing.

1583370000.title: Bloomberg Markets: China Open
1583370000.descr: The definitive guide to the markets in Hong Kong and on the mainland. Rishaad Salamat, David Ingles, Tom Mackenzie and Yvonne Man bring you the latest analysis to get you ready for the trading day.

1583373600.title: Bloomberg Markets: Asia
1583373600.descr: Bloomberg Markets: Asia. Live from Hong Kong, bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news information as it happens.

1583380800.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East
1583380800.descr: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East live from Dubai, connects Asian markets to the European opens. The show focuses on global macro issues with a Middle Eastern context.
